AT.name: Shin Chan Vol. 2
AT.description: Altersfreigabe: Dieser Film ist für Kinder ab 12 Jahren geeignet. Diese Software ist nur auf Englisch verfügbar. Shin Chan is the nickname of the hero, Shinnosuke Nohara. He is a foulmouthed, lively and tireless 5-year-old boy. He’s crazy about beautiful girls, chocolate cookies and the Ultra Hero series. Oh! And teasing his mother, Misae. He has the ability of finding the weak point of those around him and ridiculing them -family, schoolmates... he drives them all to despair! The whole neighborhood suffers at his hands! Episode 1: Hey, the Baby is Coming! Hey, the Baby’s Here! Hey, the Baby Girl is Born! Episode 2: Hey, I Know a Cooking Genius! Hey, It’s Time for a Major Cleanup! Hey, Looking Back at the Past Year! Episode 3: Hey, Detective Nohara Comes into Action! Hey, Detective Nohara Comes into Action! 2 Hey, Detective Nohara Comes into Action! 3 Episode 4: Hey, Meet the Shinchan-Terminator! Hey, It’s New Year With the Matsuzaka Sisters! Episode 5: Hey, It’s Time for New Year’s Holidays With the Family! Hey, This Game... Is True To Life! Hey, I’m Going Shopping with My Grandpas! Episode 6: Hey, Here Are the Happy Prince and Shinnosuke, the Swallow! Hey, My Sister is a Little Rascal! Hey, A Husband for Nene!
